entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vaudreuil-Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain mixed with snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
